评价内容
content
Except for special effects, I don’t know what else to look at.
Disappointment of the year, I don't know where all the good reviews come from.
The excitement ends when the movie ends.
A bad script with no substantial content is a dead wood.
I finished seeing this movie only because of the actress!
I have no idea what this movie is about, only thing I remember is whose shoulder I leaned on.
The only feeling I got from seeing this movie is awkward…even after reading the reviews I still don't understand.
Seeing this movie is like having a nightmare!
I don't know what's left except for the theme song and that cheap special effect.
The story is bad, conflict is too intentional, the logical support of the occurrence of the whole event is very strange, characters are not vivid.
I guess they spent half of the budget on editing the trailer! All the highlights are in the trailer, no need to see the whole movie at all.
I just want to ask myself again and again, why did I buy the ticket from the very start?
All the characters are so disgusting, all faking and pathetic, there is no sincerity at all.
Even the PPT my boss used in meeting is better than this.
That just hurt my eyes and my heart.
No one dare to say this is just a worthless piece of junk?
Big ambition, small achievement. Far worse than expected.
The director tried really hard to take my hard-working earned money away by this bullshit.
I'm probably don't want to see any more movies. Ever.
Praise the crew of this fantastic movie!
They say movies are often difficult to transcend literature, but this movie just proved them wrong.
I can think of thousands of better ways to waste my money than buy this ticket.
I am still relishing the lines. Every line is expressed just right.
I don't think they know what they wants to express through this movie.
It takes 7 days for god to creat this world. Why did it takes so long for you to shoot a bad movie like this?
This is super awkward.
Yeah, another "finding yourself" movie. Not my type.
Everyone thinks it's good. Well it is good in some way, but it's not that good to me.
I've got nothing to say about this movie. Don't even know If we should call it a movie.
Who cares what the movie is about, I just want to see my idol in screen!
Okay we see you're good at special effects, but we want a real MOVIE rather than a collection of effects.
If this is a philosophical discussion, then it's too shallow. If this is a suspense of class contradictions, then it's wrong.
The reviews are even better than the movie itself.
All of my friends think highly of this movie, but I just fall asleep in the middle…Nothing new in the story, just the same old as any other movies
It doesn't touch my heart. At all.
No surprise seeing this movie. You can guess almost everything right in this movie.
Definitely don't want to see it twice.
This mvie really makes me cry!
Thank god it started raining in the middle of this movie, gove me a perfect reason to not to tolerate it till the end.
Why shoot a 2-hour's movie when you can just tell the whole story in just 5 minutes?
This movie doesn't have the courage to step forward. Everything is still the same with the last one.
The lens language is elegant and charming, the scheduling is smooth and advanced, and everything is impeccably perfect.
Yeah it's okay. Not good, but okay.
I like it! Good story.
Contains grand vigour in small frame, tells a complicated story in a simple script.
Just average.
Not smooth enough.
I was very touched by this movie, my heart was cold, and the water was salty like tears.
It's raining both outside the cinema and inside my heart.
Although the characters are somewhat facial, there are still some things to express.
Recommended.
Take my breath! And the main actors are soooo handsome!
The story is too fragmented. Though the atmosphere is excellent and the performance is good.
Beyond my expectation.
Well it's not about the story, it's about how you tell the story. I enjoyed this movie, if not for the air conditioner is too cold, it'll be a perfect experience.
This young director does have some good idea with this movie. Well done.
I have stayed in Mexico for half a month. This movie makes me miss that mexican girl I met here again.
Expressed director’s personal style in terms of film performance skills perfectly.
I like the beginning and the end, but the middle is a bit awkward.
We hold each other when the bgm starts, and I 'll never forget this moment.
Compact story with interlocking plots, impressed.
Suitable endings for every character.
Wonderful performance makes wonderful movie.
Interesting movie with good performance.
The soundtrack is breath-taking and the picture is fantastic.
I'd still be touched even it's not the first time I've see a movie like this.
Very creative, tells a good story of a new subject.
Movie of the year!
Good conversastion design and good performance.
Terrific! There are gifted people after all.
Wonderful, I can't think of any movie that can be a challenge to this one. 9.9/10 recommended.
Unexpectedly but reasonalble.
My emotions and opinions are constantly flipping and subverting during this 100 minutes!
Simple but deep.
I'm still feeling the emotion after the movie is ended.
It's unforgettable…oh I mean the girl who leaned on my shoulder to cry.
This is the second time I buy ticket to see it.
Really touching.
Well it makes me believe there's true love in this world again.
The story is totally breath-taking, and the actors know what they're doing.
That's we call a good story: you think you know how it goes, but it can still caught you by surprise.
Epic.
It's way beyond my imagination.
I can see an Oskar reward coming.
This movie just told everyone that you don't need superstars to shoot a good movie.
10/10 recommended. A wonderful experience.
I feel lucky to live in a world with movies like this.
I'd stay in the cinema and see this movie once more and more and more!
This is toxic! I can't resist the urge to tell everyone how good it is!
This is masterpiece.
